resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/Pipeline Load from SQL to Data Lake')]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    s.name AS SchemaName,
    t.name AS TableName
FROM sys.tables t
INNER JOIN sys.schemas s ON s.schema_id = t.schema_id
WHERE s.name = 'dbo';

activities.name: Copy data from SQL to Data Lake

dependsOn.activity: Copy data from SQL to Data Lake

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT

FROM sys.tables t
INNER JOIN sys.schemas s ON s.schema_id = t.schema_id
WHERE s.name = 'dbo';

activities.name: Copy data from SQL to Data Lake

dependsOn.activity: Copy data from SQL to Data Lake

resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/Trigger 1')]

pipelineReference.referenceName: Pipeline Load from SQL to Data Lake_v2

dependsOn: [concat(variables('workspaceId'), '/pipelines/Pipeline Load from SQL to Data Lake_v2')]

content.query:
/*
Step 1: run 's1_woca_db_schemas' and 's2_create_external_data_source' to create the woca_ldw database (virtual wearhouse)
Step 2: create a pipeline that fetches the data from the SQL server into our datalake
- pipeline will also make use of the "bronze.usp_create_views" procedure to write views for each table under the bronze schema
*/

/*
Create stored procedure
that will use CETAS to create external tables for each of the procedures
*/

/*
1st Create stored procedure that will use CETAS to create external tables for each of the procedures
2nd run each procedure before we can use them
*/

USE woca_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE bronze.usp_create_views 
@folder NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_view_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX);

    SET @create_view_sql_stmt = 
        'CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_'+ @folder + '
            AS
            SELECT
            *
            FROM
                OPENROWSET(
                    BULK ''https://asawocastaccdl.dfs.core.windows.net/asa-woca-adlfs-wsp-cnt/bronze/' + @folder + '/**'',
                    FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
                ) AS [result]'
    print(@create_view_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_view_sql_stmt;

END;

-- Then use a Stored Procedure in the Pipeline to call this procedure

USE master
GO

CREATE DATABASE woca_ldw
GO

ALTER DATABASE woca_ldw COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
GO

USE woca_ldw
GO

CREATE SCHEMA bronze
GO

CREATE SCHEMA silver
GO

CREATE SCHEMA gold
GO

-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES AS SELECT (CETAS)
--- We are just transforming table/view to select only the columns we need

USE woca_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.Individual') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Individual
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Individual
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/Individual',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT *
  FROM bronze.vw_Individual;


 SELECT * FROM silver.individual;

USE woca_ldw
GO


CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_individual
AS
BEGIN

    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.Individual') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Individual

    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Individual
        WITH
        (
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            LOCATION = 'silver/Individual',
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
        )
    AS
    SELECT *
    FROM bronze.vw_Individual;

END;

-- 1. switch to use woca_ldw
USE woca_ldw
GO 

-- 2.) Drop view for trip_data_green if it already exist
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_individual
GO

-- 3.) Create view for trip_data_green
CREATE VIEW silver.vw_individual
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL OR
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL OR
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL OR
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL OR
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO

USE master
GO

CREATE DATABASE woca_ldw
GO

ALTER DATABASE woca_ldw COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
GO

USE woca_ldw
GO

CREATE SCHEMA bronze
GO

CREATE SCHEMA silver
GO

CREATE SCHEMA gold
GO

-- Switch to the right database
USE woca_ldw
GO

-- Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE woca_data_src 
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://asa-woca-adlfs-wsp-cnt@asawocastaccdl.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)
GO


-- Then use a Script to write script to create data inside this data source

--DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE woca_data_src

USE woca_ldw
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

--Explore the datatypes and column_ordinals
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''bronze/Individual/*.parquet'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''woca_data_src'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'
GO



-- Chech the maximum length of some columns
/*
MAX(LEN(contactid)),
MAX(LEN(mag_agegroupidname)),
MAX(LEN(gendercodelabel)),
MAX(LEN(mag_tribeprimaryidname)),
MAX(LEN(mag_tribeprimaryidname)),
MAX(LEN(mag_phoregistered)),
MAX(LEN(mag_ethnicityprimaryid)),
MAX(LEN(mag_physicaldisability)),
MAX(LEN(statuscodelabel)),
*/
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(statuscodelabel)) AS MAX_LEN
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO


-- Select specific columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
GO


-- Select specific columns where age_group_name is not null
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE age_group_name IS NOT NULL
GO


-- Count the number of records 8634
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
GO

-- Count the number of records when age_group_name is null 8547
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE age_group_name IS NOT NULL
GO






-- Remove rows with the null in any of the listed columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL AND
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL AND
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL AND
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO

-- Remove rows with the null in any of the listed columns COUNT: 4725
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL AND
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL AND
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL AND
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO





-- Remove rows with the null in all of the listed columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL OR
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL OR
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL OR
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL OR
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO

-- Remove rows with the null in all of the listed columns COUNT: 8605
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL OR
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL OR
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL OR
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL OR
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO


/*
===============USE THIS TO CREATE SILVER VIEW==========
*/

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL OR
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL OR
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL OR
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL OR
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO

-- 1. switch to use woca_ldw
USE woca_ldw
GO 

-- 2.) Drop view for trip_data_green if it already exist
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_family
GO

-- 3.) Create view for trip_data_green
CREATE VIEW silver.vw_family
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Family/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_id VARCHAR(50) 64,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(50) 46,
        postcode VARCHAR(15) 9,
        city VARCHAR(50) 32,
        state_code_label VARCHAR(20) 39
    ) AS [family]
GO

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;


/*
CSV EXTERNAL FILE FORMATS
==========================
*/
--1a. Create file format csv_file_format for parser version 2.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='csv_file_format_pv2')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pv2  
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '2.0' )   
      );  

--DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_v2

--2a Create file format csv_file_format_pv1 for parser version 1.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='csv_file_format_pv1')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pv1 
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' )   
      );  


/*
TSV EXTERNAL FILE FORMATS
==========================
*/
--1b. Create file format tsv_file_format for parser version 2.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='tsv_file_format_pv2')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format_pv2  
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t'  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '2.0' )   
      );  

--2b. Create file format tsv_file_format for parser version 1.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='tsv_file_format_pv1')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format_pv1 
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t'  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' )   
      );  



/*
PARQUET EXTERNAL FILE FORMATS
=============================
*/
--1c. Create external file format for parquet_file_format
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='parquet_file_format')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format  
  WITH (  
        FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,  
        DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'  
       ); 



/*
DELTA EXTERNAL FILE FORMATS
===========================
*/
--1d. Create external file format for delta_file_format
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='delta_file_format')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format  
  WITH (  
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA,  
        DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'  
       );

USE woca_ldw
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Family/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

--Explore the datatypes and column_ordinals

    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''bronze/Family/*.parquet'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''woca_data_src'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'
GO



-- Chech the maximum length of some columns
/*
MAX(LEN(mag_familygroupid)),
MAX(LEN(mag_primarycontact)),
MAX(LEN(mag_physical_postcode)),
MAX(LEN(mag_physical_city)),
MAX(LEN(statecodelabel))
*/
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(statecodelabel)) AS MAX_LEN
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Family/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

SELECT
    mag_familygroupid,
    mag_primarycontact,
    mag_physical_postcode,
    mag_physical_city
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Family/*.parquet',

        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

-- Select specific columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Family/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_id VARCHAR(50) 64,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(50) 46,
        postcode VARCHAR(15) 9,
        city VARCHAR(50) 32,
        state_code_label VARCHAR(20) 39
    ) AS [family]
GO


-- Select specific columns where age_group_name is not null
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Family/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_id VARCHAR(50) 64,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(50) 46,
        postcode VARCHAR(15) 9,
        city VARCHAR(50) 32,
        state_code_label VARCHAR(20) 39
    ) AS [family]
WHERE family_id IS NOT NULL
GO


-- Count the number of records 8634
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Family/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_id VARCHAR(50) 64,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(50) 46,
        postcode VARCHAR(15) 9,
        city VARCHAR(50) 32,
        state_code_label VARCHAR(20) 39
    ) AS [family]
GO


/*
===============USE THIS TO CREATE SILVER VIEW==========
*/

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Family/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_id VARCHAR(50) 64,

    ) AS [family]

-- 1. switch to use woca_ldw
USE woca_ldw
GO 

-- 2.) Drop view for trip_data_green if it already exist
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_family_membership
GO

-- 3.) Create view for trip_data_green
CREATE VIEW silver.vw_family_membership
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_membership_id VARCHAR(50) 15,
        individual VARCHAR(50) 25,
        family VARCHAR(50) 10,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(10) 17,
        family_relationship VARCHAR(20) 4,
        family_relationship_label VARCHAR(20) 5
    ) AS [familyMember]
GO

USE woca_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE bronze.usp_create_views 
@folder NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_view_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX);

    SET @create_view_sql_stmt = 
        'CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_'+ @folder + '
            AS
            SELECT
            *
            FROM
                OPENROWSET(
                    BULK ''https://asawocastaccdl.dfs.core.windows.net/asa-woca-adlfs-wsp-cnt/bronze/' + @folder + '/**'',
                    FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
                ) AS [result]'
    print(@create_view_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_view_sql_stmt;

END;

-- Then use a Stored Procedure in the Pipeline to call this procedure

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_membership_id VARCHAR(50) 15,
        individual VARCHAR(50) 25,
        family VARCHAR(50) 10,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(10) 17,
        family_relationship VARCHAR(20) 4,
        family_relationship_label VARCHAR(20) 5
    ) AS [familyMember]
GO

--1a. perform join on family family membership and family
SELECT 
    i.*, fm.*, f.*
FROM silver.vw_individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family);



--1b count items you have joined 
SELECT 
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.vw_individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family);


-- 1c. count how many individuals/family were assigned a primart contact
SELECT
    f.primary_contact,
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.vw_individual i
JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
GROUP BY f.primary_contact
ORDER BY totals DESC;

-- 2c. remove the null values
SELECT
    f.primary_contact,
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.vw_individual i
JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
WHERE f.primary_contact IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY f.primary_contact
ORDER BY totals DESC;


--3c get the distinct counts of individuals/family were assigned primart contacts
SELECT
    DISTINCT(COUNT(1)) AS primary_contact_assi
FROM silver.vw_individual i
JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
WHERE f.primary_contact IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY f.primary_contact
ORDER BY totals DESC;

--1d count the number of individuals that belong to each family relationship
--Qn: where is the dict for (family_relationship)
SELECT
    fm.family_relationship,
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.vw_individual i
JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
GROUP BY fm.family_relationship
ORDER BY totals DESC;

-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES AS SELECT (CETAS)
--- We are just transforming table/view to select only the columns we need

USE woca_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.Family') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Family
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Family
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/Family',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT *
  FROM bronze.vw_Family;


 SELECT * FROM silver.Family;
